remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举用于表示的数据输入模式控件。The enumeration is used to represent the data-entry modes of a control. 若要确定控件的当前模式，使用属性。To determine the current mode of the control, use the property. Insert 或 update 操作之后,控件返回到所指定的模式属性。After an insert or update operation, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 默认情况下，控件返回到只读模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode. 你可以指定的备用模式，以通过设置返回到属性。You can specify an alternate mode to return to by setting the property. 若要以编程方式更改模式，使用方法。To change modes programmatically, use the method. 当控件更改模式下, 表中的事件引发。When the control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时控件尝试更改之间编辑、 insert 和只读模式，但在实际更改模式之前。Occurs when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||之后，将会控制已从编辑、 插入或只读模式更改为另一种模式。Occurs after a control has changed from edit, insert, or read-only mode to another mode. 此事件通常用于执行某项任务时控件更改模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使控件处于编辑模式，通过设置更新操作之后属性`FormViewMode.Edit`。The following example demonstrates how to keep the control in edit mode after an update operation by setting the property to `FormViewMode.Edit`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
